title: [Review] Hydroxytyrosol: A natural compound with promising pharmacological activities: 'The main dietary source of hydroxytyrosol is extra virgin olive oil. Hydroxytyrosol has anti-inflammatory, anti-oxidant, neuroprotective, immunomodulatory effects.'

[Animal Study] Inflammatory and Lipid Peroxidation effects of Canola Oil, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, and Sunflower Oil on Albino Rats Fed With the Oils. 'The average MDA (malondialdehyde) activity of the extra virgin olive oil group was the lowest.. sunflower oil group recording the highest SOD activity'
